[[Bronze Star Medal|Bronze Star]] (United States) |laterwork = }} [[Major General (Australia)|Major General]] '''Richard 'Rick' Maxwell Burr''', [[Distinguished Service Cross (Australia)|DSC]], [[Member of the Order of Australia|AM]], [[Member of the Royal Victorian Order|MVO]] is a senior officer in the Australian Army and is currently serving as the Commander of the [[1st Division (Australia)|1st Division]] ==Service History== MAJGEN Burr joined the [[Australian Army]] at the age of 17 as an officer and was sent to the [[Royal Military College, Duntroon]]. After graduation from [[Royal Military College, Duntroon|Duntroon]], MAJGEN Burr served as a platoon commander in the [[8th/9th Battalion, Royal Australian Regiment]], with the majority of his regimental career with the [[Special forces of Australia]].[http://www.jointwarfareconference.com.au/spk-rick-burr.asp Inaugural Joint Warfare Conference] - Inaugural Joint Warfare Conference 2011 ==Honours and Awards==
